content: Do not deviate from the plan - if you think you need to deviate, STOP and ask the user for guidance
Remove TransformationType::StringToObject from the enum definition
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after removing StringToObject from enum
Remove the StringToObject case from apply_transformation() function
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after removing StringToObject from apply_transformation
Remove StringToObject from get_possible_transformations() for String values
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after removing StringToObject from get_possible_transformations
Remove the StringToObject case from hint generation in try_component_format_alternatives_legacy()
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after removing StringToObject hint generation
Update the diagnostic message in analyze_schema_for_type() to clarify that both #[derive(Serialize, Deserialize)] AND #[reflect(Serialize, Deserialize)] are needed
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after updating error message
Modify tiered_type_format_discovery() to better handle and propagate serialization diagnostic errors
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after improving error propagation

Run cargo clippy --workspace --all-targets --all-features -- -D warnings -W clippy::all -W clippy::pedantic -W clippy::nursery -W clippy::cargo -A clippy::multiple_crate_versions -A clippy::cargo_common_metadata
Fix any issues reported by clippy
Run cargo +nightly fmt
Run cargo nextest run
If there are test issues, STOP and review them with the user
Task a new subagent to do a code review of the changes focusing on identifying duplication and complexity (read and analyze only, no modifications)
When code review subagent returns, STOP and review the suggested changes with the user
